events.message: I received my order yesterday but unfortunately I want to return the item for a full refund as it does not meet my expectations.
The system has categorized this customer issue as a refund request due to return and money back keywords.
Assigning this refund case to a customer service agent specializing in returns and refunds.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear you want to return your item. I’ll help you with the refund process right away.
Could you please provide your order number and reason for the return to speed up the refund process?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. I want to return it because the color was different from the pictures shown online.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate the refund process once we receive the returned item. We will also send you a prepaid return label.
Thanks for the quick response and help. I appreciate the prepaid label and will send the item back tomorrow.
We have received your returned item and processed your full refund. You should see the amount reflected in your account within 3-5 business days.
Just following up to confirm that you have received the refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
As we have not heard back from you, we are closing this refund case. Thank you for contacting support.
We have sent you a short satisfaction survey via email to gather your feedback on your support experience.
